## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [De novo transcriptome assembly, annotation, and differential expression analysis](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/transcriptomics/tutorials/full-de-novo/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
